PASSWORD_LESS_HEADING: FastComments will use your email as a password - we'll send you a secure login link.
CREATE_ACCOUNT_INFO: If you don't have an account, this will create one for you.
EMAIL_HELP_TEXT: We'll send you a link via email to sign in. If you don't have an account we will create one for you.
CAPTCHA_HELP: Helps determine you're not a bot.
